activate.title: Activació
activate.text2: Dubion is a Web App where you can search for Albums, Songs and Artists you want to see.
activate.text3: It simple design allows ours users to easily find what they are looking for. Furthermore, they can listen a sample track of any Album’s song and collect their favourite Albums and Artists.
activate.text5: To search for any kind of Song, Album or Artist, you just have to use the search menu and select the category:
activate.text6: You can access the album’s artist by clicking in the Artist name here:
activate.text7: Or go to an album from the artist by clicking on any of them:
activate.text8: Make an Album or Artist your favourite by clicking here:
activate.text9: Then you can access to your favourite lists by clicking here:
activate.text10: To edit your profile just click here:
activate.text11: Finally, you can change the page language by choosing one here:
